page.title: 11Farming continued
page.content:
A day at Ion Farm Wed.19 June l985
of the dutch barn with chalk, ready for the hay to be stored. The hay was turned in readiness for baling when it is dry enough, the vet came to see some cows, to examine them to see if they were in calf, we moved some heifers to new grazing, large round bales were moved from Streatley to Gravenhurst for the beef cattle, maintenance work was done on some trailers.
There are other farms in the area, Town Farm, Millfield Farm both arable.Home Farm, Wrest Park,Silsoe is both arable and beef rearing. Home Farm also farms Cainhoe Manor Farm although the manor house is owned privately. There is a suggestion that the house was at one time one of
